neck_flexion.label: Neck Flexion
neck_flexion.iso_principle: Maintain a neutral neck posture; avoid excessive flexion.

upper_back_recline.label: Upper Back Recline
upper_back_recline.iso_principle: Support natural thoracic curvature and prevent excessive rounding.

shoulder_elevation.label: Shoulder Elevation
shoulder_elevation.iso_principle: Keep shoulders relaxed and minimize elevation during tasks.

elbow_angle.label: Elbow Angle
elbow_angle.iso_principle: Maintain a comfortable open elbow posture with adequate arm support.

wrist_deviation.label: Wrist Deviation
wrist_deviation.iso_principle: Maintain neutral wrist alignment; avoid sustained radial/ulnar deviation.

pelvic_tilt.label: Pelvic Tilt
pelvic_tilt.iso_principle: Ensure the chair and backrest provide support to maintain neutral pelvic positioning.

viewing_distance.label: Viewing Distance
viewing_distance.iso_principle: Maintain proper viewing distance to reduce visual strain and promote neutral posture.

monitor_top_height.label: Monitor Top Height Relative to Eyes
monitor_top_height.iso_principle: Ensure the monitor top is level with or slightly below eye height to minimize neck flexion.

green.description: ISO-Compliant. Minimal deviation from recommended posture.

yellow.description: Minor ISO Deviation. Corrective action advised.

red.description: Major ISO Deviation. High risk of strain; requires immediate correction.
